reviews.review_msg:
I would not recommend Nicky as a prof. The way she conveys information is very condescending and her feedback is super discouraging. I almost changed majors after taking her class, but now I'm very glad I didn't listen to her. 

Also, group projects were a huge part of our grade, and having members who were uncommitted made this very frustrating.
You have to work for a good grade! But if you attend class and try your best to participate, she's very understanding and explains things well.
